棙字的基本解释

棙
lì
〔机棙〕机关，如“刻木为鹤，大如小驷，羁辔中设棙棙，人或逼之，奋然飞动。”
弹奏琵琶等时拨动弦的东西。

棙
liè
南烛树，落叶小乔木，叶卵形，革质，蒴果近球形。枝叶和果实均可入药，有毒。
古同“捩”，转动。

棙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《集韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
机纽。
[②]［liè］
［《集韻》力結切，入屑，來。］
同“捩1”。
转动。

棙字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棙； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页532第21
【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】?郞計切，音荔。【集韻】琵琶，其撥曰棙。　又關棙，機棙也。【廣記】唐韓志和雕木爲鸞鶴，置機棙于腹中，發之則飛。　又【集韻】【韻會】?力結切，音裂。木名。【本草】作綟。善破血。　又紾也，捋也。【韓愈·送窮文】棙手覆羹。

棙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
棙字的起名意思

暂无。

He
Basic explanation of words
He
lì
[Mechanism] Organs, such as "carved wood as a crane, as large as a small siege, with a siege in the bridle, people may force them, and they will fly."
Something that plucks the strings while playing the pipa.
He
liè
Southern candle tree, small deciduous tree, ovoid leaves, leathery, and nearly spherical capsules. Both branches, leaves and fruits can be used as medicine and are poisonous.
The ancient same "has", turning.
He
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Ji Yun" Lang Ji cut, go to Ji, come. ]
Machine button.
[②]［liè］
["Jiyun" forcefully cuts, enters the crumbs, come. ]
Same as "捩1".
Rotate.
He
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棙; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 532 21
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] [Rhyme Meeting]? Tan Jiqie, Yinli. 【Jiyun】Pipa, its dialing is called 棙.　It's off again, and it's also machine. [Guangji] Tang Hanzhi and the carved wood are Luanhe, put the machine in the abdomen, and the hair will fly.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Strong knot cut, sound split. Wooden name. 【Materia Medica】made. Good to break the blood.　Yeah again, stroke it too. [Han Yu·Send Qiongwen] The succumb to the hand.
